desc: <tftitemrules>This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.</tftitemrules>
name: Rabadon's Deathcap

desc:
When the holder dies, grant this item's stats to each Darkflight champion.

[Aquired from copying a non-Craftable item via the Darkflight Trait].
name: Darkflight Essence

desc: If the holder of this item gets a takedown, they will be consumed and Aatrox will be reborn!
name: The Darkin Blade

desc: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.
name: Infinity Edge

desc: Every @HealthRegenInterval@ seconds, regenerate @PercentHealthDamage@% maximum Health.
name: Dragon's Will

desc: After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks deal <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@DamageAmpPct@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> more damage for @Duration@ seconds.
name: Willbreaker

desc:
@MRShred@% Shred enemies within @HexRange@ hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are also zapped for magic damage equal to @ManaRatio@% of their maximum Mana.

Also, regenerate @MaxHealthRegen@% maximum Health per second.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
name: Covalent Spark

desc:
Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for @SpellShieldDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
name: Quickestsilver

desc:
Grant @OmniVamp@% Omnivamp. Damage dealt heals the lowest percent Health ally for the same amount.

Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@
name: Hextech Lifeblade

desc:
Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to @1StarBounces@ enemies, dealing @Damage@ magic damage and @MRShred@% Shredding them for @MRShredDuration@ seconds.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
name: Statikk's Favor

desc: Once per combat: At @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain %i:scaleArmor% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@Stats@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Armor and %i:scaleMR% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@Stats@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Magic Resist for the rest of combat, and a <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@ShieldHealthPercent@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> maximum Health shield that lasts up to @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
name: Bulwark's Oath

desc:
Abilities cost %i:scaleMana% @ManaReduction@ less Mana to cast.

If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within @TakedownTimer@ seconds of casting, gain %i:scaleMana% @ManaOnTakedown@ Mana.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
name: Blue Blessing

desc: Combat start: Gain %i:scaleAP% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@APPerInterval@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Ability Power every <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@IntervalSeconds@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> seconds.
name: Urf-Angel's Staff

desc:
Magic or true damage from the holder's Ability @BurnPercent@% Burns and @GrievousWoundsPercent@% Wounds enemies for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: deals some of the target's maximum Health as true damage
Wound: reduces healing received
name: More More-ellonomicon

desc:
Negates all bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal @1StarAoEDamage@/@2StarAoEDamage@/@3StarAoEDamage@ %i:star% magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every @ICD@ seconds).

[Direct damage item]
name: Rosethorn Vest

desc:
Combat start: A Radiant Voidmother with bonus Health and Attack Damage arises and Taunts nearby enemies.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter
name: Zz'Rots Invitation

desc:
Combat start: Shoot a wider beam that @CostIncrease@% Mana Reaves enemies.
Your team gains %i:scaleMana% @AllyBonusMana@ starting Mana.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast
name: Shroud of Reverence

desc:
Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing @MultiplierForDamage@% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage.

​​[Direct damage item]
name: Runaan's Tempest

desc:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for @BanishDuration@ seconds.
Your team gains %i:scaleAS% @AllyBonusAS@% Attack Speed.

[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]
name: Mistral

desc: Attacks grant %i:scaleAS% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@AttackSpeedPerStack@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.
name: Guinsoo's Reckoning

desc:
Grant 2 effects:
  • %i:scaleAD% @ADBuff*100@% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% @APBuff@ Ability Power.
  • @TraitMultiplier@% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
name: Fist of Fairness

desc:
Every @ICD@ seconds, an enemy within @HexRange@ hexes is @BurnPercent@% Burned and @GrievousWoundsPercent@% Wounded for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: deals some of the target's maximum Health as true damage
Wound: reduces healing received

desc:

​​[Aura item]

desc:
If the wearer starts combat in the front 2 rows, regenerate @HealingPercentPerTickPerStage@-@HealingPercentPerTickPerStage*7@% maximum Health per second (based on stage). If they start in the back 2 rows, gain @ADandAPPerTick@-@ADandAPPerTick*7@% AD and AP every second instead.

If the wearer of this item dies, you instantly lose the fight.

You can remove this item by benching the wearer.

Double Up: This item no longer causes you to lose the fight that round if it's holder is part of a reinforcement.
